Description.Name: Terran
Description.Details: Centuries ago, your family came to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]] from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTerranHegemony],Terran Hegemony]].

OptionDescription: While the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTerranHegemony],Terran Hegemony]] no longer exists after being swallowed by the Great Houses during the Succession Wars, any MechWarrior that traces its lineage to these worlds, will usually claim some past link to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague],Star League]] or even the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSLDF],SLDF]]. A minority might instead try to hide their past because of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseCameron],House Cameron]]'s actions that caused the end of the Hegemony and the civil war that preceded the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSuccessionWars],Succession Wars]].
BioDescription: Centuries ago, your family came to the  Rimward Periphery from the Terran Hegemony. MechWarriors with a past family link to the Star League or the SLDF often either take pride on their heritage or are prefer to hide their past because of the shame associated by same with House Cameron, the last lords of the Terran Hegemony.
